reviews.review: Everything a superhero film should be

As a hater of superhero movies, this was my favorite Marvel movie by far. I don't pay attention to the pre-movie stuff, so I had no idea what was going to happen. It didn't follow the generic superhero plot that everyother Marvel movie has. Also proved that Thor could do everything by himself and none of the other superheroes matter.
The main villian is gotta be one of the stupidest villians ever
Best Avengers film of all time.
One of my favorite movies of all time!! It brings so many emotions and is very vell written.

It was so awesome!!! However they made Thanos where he can able to do anything, I understand stand that He is the Best bad guy, But the avengers (To be Honest) Could have got some huge hits on him. Grade: A-
Absolutely brilliant. Didn't think it was possible for Marvel to top itself again. I thankfully was hilariously wrong.
The best Avengers movie including Endgame.

This certainly was not worth 10 years of building up the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Adam Warlock was nowhere to be seen and he was supposed to be the main catalyst in the Infinity Gauntlet saga of comic books. I understand why they decided not to put him in infinity war, but if they maybe made a movie about him and maybe rope in Guardians of the Galaxy to have a feel for the character so that he is not some character from a movie then he would have made a bigger impact. This movie downplayed Thanos to just an ordinary villain rather than the ultimate enemy to all sentient races like for example; Thanos was a Deviant of supreme power with a vast amount of knowledge, possessor of the cosmic cube and is culmination of Marvel's magic characters. He also has an obsession with death and even the physical manifestation of death to the point of wiping out half the universe to gain her affections. Why did they reduce the Marvel Universe down so much that they made it a nonsensical mess. I really hope that they improve in the next movie or i will put all my support into the DCEU.
